sentences.english: This wine goes great with herb roasted chicken or seared snapper with capers.
sentences.chinese: 這款酒搭配香草烤雞或清烤魚最佳。

sentences.english: They tie the hands and legs of suspects like roasted chickens.
sentences.chinese: 他們把嫌疑犯的手腳捆綁起來，就像烤雞那樣。

sentences.english: The 11-year-old boy couldn't wait to eat the roast chicken.
sentences.chinese: 那個十一歲的男孩迫不及待地喫烤雞。

sentences.english: Drink anytime, or to accompany roast chicken and other white meats.
sentences.chinese: 此酒可獨飲，搭配烤雞肉等白肉類亦佳。

sentences.english: She wrapped the roast chicken up in foil.
sentences.chinese: 她用錫箔紙將烤雞包起來了。

sentences.english: Truss the chicken before you roast it.
sentences.chinese: 烤雞前先將雞貼身紮緊。

sentences.english: Flavorful yakitori skewers are the highlights.
sentences.chinese: 可口的烤雞肉串是這家餐廳的特色。

sentences.english: Like its predecessor, Kentucky Fried Chicken has its own secret recipe.
sentences.chinese: 和它的前輩一樣，肯德基烤雞肉也有自己的祕方。

sentences.english: So is grilled chicken or a green salad with low-cal dressing.
sentences.chinese: 因此是烤雞或與低熱量的選礦的一道蔬菜沙拉。
我比較愛喫意大利式的烤雞。

sentences.english: Bye bye American fries, Bonjour pâtisseries of Paris.
sentences.chinese: 再見了美國烤雞，我來了，巴黎的法式糕點。

sentences.english: Grilled chicken with special mushroom sauce, served with butter rice and fresh garden salad.
sentences.chinese: 香烤雞塊伴特製蘑菇醬，配有油飯和新鮮田園沙拉。

sentences.english: Baked chicken one night can become fajitas the next night.
sentences.chinese: 過夜的烤雞可以加工成次夜的墨西哥鐵板燒。

sentences.english: The platter with balinese satay grilled chicken wings and fried so tong.
sentences.chinese: 拼盤有巴里沙嗲烤雞翅膀炸蘇東都真的蠻好喫的。

sentences.english: The salads with grilled chicken also have liquid margarine.
sentences.chinese: 那個烤雞沙拉也添加了人造奶油。

sentences.english: We can broil chicken on the grill tonight, or we can just eat leftovers.
sentences.chinese: 我們今天晚上可以烤雞肉喫，或者喫剩菜。

definition: to cook on a skewer/barbecued food on a skewer/shish kebab/(fig.) to perform or play songs in sequence/sequence of songs/medley
